@ember/runloop.name: begin
bind

params.name: target
params.description: target of method to call

params.name: method
params.description:
Method to invoke.
  May be a function or a string. If you pass a string
  then it will be looked up on the passed target.

params.name: args*
params.description: Any additional arguments you wish to pass to the method.

return.description: returns a new function that will always have a particular context

@ember/runloop.name: cancel

params.name: timer
params.description: Timer object to cancel

return.description: true if canceled or false/undefined if it wasn't found

@ember/runloop.name: debounce

params.name: target
params.description: target of method to invoke

params.name: method
params.description:
The method to invoke.
  May be a function or a string. If you pass a string
  then it will be looked up on the passed target.

params.name: args*
params.description: Optional arguments to pass to the timeout.

params.name: wait
params.description: Number of milliseconds to wait.

params.name: immediate
params.description:
Trigger the function on the leading instead
  of the trailing edge of the wait interval. Defaults to false.

return.description: Timer information for use in canceling, see `run.cancel`.

@ember/runloop.name: end
join

params.name: target
params.description: target of method to call

params.name: method
params.description:
Method to invoke.
  May be a function or a string. If you pass a string
  then it will be looked up on the passed target.

params.name: args*
params.description: Any additional arguments you wish to pass to the method.

return.description:
Return value from invoking the passed function. Please note,
when called within an existing loop, no return value is possible.

@ember/runloop.name: later

params.name: target
params.description: target of method to invoke

params.name: method
params.description:
The method to invoke.
  If you pass a string it will be resolved on the
  target at the time the method is invoked.

params.name: args*
params.description: Optional arguments to pass to the timeout.

params.name: wait
params.description: Number of milliseconds to wait.

return.description: Timer information for use in canceling, see `run.cancel`.

@ember/runloop.name: next

params.name: target
params.description: target of method to invoke

params.name: method
params.description:
The method to invoke.
  If you pass a string it will be resolved on the
  target at the time the method is invoked.

params.name: args*
params.description: Optional arguments to pass to the timeout.

return.description: Timer information for use in canceling, see `run.cancel`.

@ember/runloop.description:
Schedule a function to run one time during the current RunLoop. This is equivalent
to calling `scheduleOnce` with the "actions" queue.
@ember/runloop.name: once

params.name: target
params.description: The target of the method to invoke.

params.name: method
params.description:
The method to invoke.
  If you pass a string it will be resolved on the
  target at the time the method is invoked.

params.name: args*
params.description: Optional arguments to pass to the timeout.

return.description: Timer information for use in canceling, see `run.cancel`.

@ember/runloop.name: schedule

params.name: queue
params.description:
The name of the queue to schedule against.
  Default queues are 'sync' and 'actions'

params.name: target
params.description: target object to use as the context when invoking a method.

params.name: method
params.description:
The method to invoke. If you pass a string it
  will be resolved on the target object at the time the scheduled item is
  invoked allowing you to change the target function.

params.name: arguments*
params.description: Optional arguments to be passed to the queued method.

return.description: Timer information for use in canceling, see `run.cancel`.

@ember/runloop.name: scheduleOnce

params.name: queue
params.description: The name of the queue to schedule against. Default queues are 'sync' and 'actions'.

params.name: target
params.description: The target of the method to invoke.

params.name: method
params.description:
The method to invoke.
  If you pass a string it will be resolved on the
  target at the time the method is invoked.

params.name: args*
params.description: Optional arguments to pass to the timeout.

return.description: Timer information for use in canceling, see `run.cancel`.

@ember/runloop.name: throttle

params.name: target
params.description: target of method to invoke

params.name: method
params.description:
The method to invoke.
  May be a function or a string. If you pass a string
  then it will be looked up on the passed target.

params.name: args*
params.description: Optional arguments to pass to the timeout.

params.name: spacing
params.description: Number of milliseconds to space out requests.

params.name: immediate
params.description:
Trigger the function on the leading instead
  of the trailing edge of the wait interval. Defaults to true.

return.description: Timer information for use in canceling, see `run.cancel`.
